page.title: 20Home Life
page.content: With the drudgery of life in poorly equiped houses and the hardness of seeking a living from the land without modern impliments now gone,home life in a peaceful,pollution free enviroment should be ideal.However the rural man now has more expense in living and travelling in country areas which mean less time to spend in the home.More wives work to help with the upkeep of this life style therefore she has less time to spend with her children and to enjoy the pleasures of rural life.Many only have time to observe nature through the t.v screens btu others have time to 'stand and stare',a rare commodity!This survey was carried out on behalf of Kilvington & District W.I. by Mrs Carol Drury and computer operaters,{ {ADAM DRURY}and{SIMON GASKELL}with some minor help from A.D.Allen.
